name: MEMessageEncoder
desc: An object that encrypts or digitally signs outgoing messages.

items.name: func encode(MEMessage, composeContext: MEComposeContext, completionHandler: (MEMessageEncodingResult) -> Void)
func getEncodingStatus(for: MEMessage, composeContext: MEComposeContext, completionHandler: (MEOutgoingMessageEncodingStatus) -> Void)
